title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Spaghetti carbonara traditionally features spaghetti pasta, eggs, guanciale (or pancetta), Pecorino Romano cheese, and black pepper, creating a rich, creamy sauce without added cream.
instructions: Spaghetti carbonara traditionally features spaghetti pasta, eggs, guanciale (or pancetta), Pecorino Romano cheese, and black pepper, creating a rich, creamy sauce without added cream.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: To make chicken tikka masala, you'll need chicken (thighs are a good choice), yogurt for the marinade, spices like garam masala, cumin, coriander, chili powder, and turmeric, plus tomatoes, cream, and onions for the sauce.
instructions: To make chicken tikka masala, you'll need chicken (thighs are a good choice), yogurt for the marinade, spices like garam masala, cumin, coriander, chili powder, and turmeric, plus tomatoes, cream, and onions for the sauce.
